attr.title: The Last Game
attr.desc: Traverse the dungeon in this awesome action / bullet-hell roguelite where every choice could make or break your run. Stack over 130 different items and create powerful synergies to become truly overpowered with 13 unique characters!
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam and copy TheLastGame.pck into the gamedata folder. You can also use the free demo. Devices with rk3326 cpu are not recommended because of low performance
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game on [Steam](store.steampowered.com/app/2563800/The_Last_Game/) and copy `TheLastGame.pck` into the `gamedata` folder. You can also use the free demo. Devices with rk3326 cpu are not recommended because of low performance
